Reviews.Title: wait before you buy
Reviews.Author: Travis T. Foss
Reviews.Content: Wait before they improve it before you buy. First, it doesn't have many apps you probably want. My bank app isn't available (capital one).  No YouTube app. No podcast player app. My favorite game app doesn't make them for the kindle. No decent weather apps are available. Second, you are stuck with the kindle browser, Silk. No chrome, Firefox, atomic, or safari. Silk is an ok browser but it doesn't handle embedded video very well. Lots of freezing and unexpected hangs. Bookmarks are awkward. Third, the touch screen is glitchier than my iPad. The cursor jumps around randomly. Good luck getting the cursor to go where you want it to when typing. Fourth, it's not easy to switch between apps. The OS stores everything in memory and the performance suffers if you use too many apps, and there's no way to close the ones you aren't using. I found myself shutting it down and restarting frequently. Fifth, a big selling point was the "one free rental book a month" deal with the kindle. But the selection is SMALL and it's impossible to search the lending library. Amazon sells the "lending library" hard, but it's clear it's not ready for primetime. Finally, some of my favorite websites are slow and glitchy with the silk browser (like slate).  The browser often hangs for no reason, even when my broadband is working fine.More rrestarting.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift for my mom, but I love it too....
Reviews.Author: Cujodu
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my mom, and a replacement for her original kindle.  But let me tell you why it's amazing for a 70-year-old... the button that brings up the Amazon rep to take care of any problems.  If every electronic device had that button I would never again have to fix my mom's computer, iPod, telephone, or etc. problems.  That would be heaven.

Reviews.Title: Overal disappointed.
Reviews.Author: drachehexe
Reviews.Content: I got this because my Android phone's screen was too small for reading and some gaming and note taking.  This is great for reading and web-surfing, in games tho the menu tab in full screen games gets in the way a lot of the time, especially the hidden object games where the tab can cover something you need to click on preventing you from progressing.I also don't like the limitations of setting up your home screen.  There is VERY little customization, my android phone is much more user interface friendly, this, this is just messy.If you can manage through the funky menu system it's a good device, good reader, good gamer, good surfer, just lousy interface, not overly user friendly at all.

Reviews.Title: Very nice tablet.
Reviews.Author: Dan R. Mason
Reviews.Content: This tablet is an upgrade from my 7 inch Kindle Fire HD. I think this tablet is great with just one negative. I prefer the speakers at the end of the tablet like on the old Kindle Fire HD. However, this tablet is so much faster and with the 64 GB of storage I can do so much more.

Reviews.Title: Xmas Gift for My Wife
Reviews.Author: Myron B.
Reviews.Content: I only have used it once, but my wife is on it all day long.  We are a five Kindle household (of 2) and this Kindle is the best to date.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Alvin C. Fogelman "onlineshopper"
Reviews.Content: I have found this to be very convenient for traveling. It is so much less bulky. for transporting. My only regret is that I couldn't afford to purchase the 8" at the time.

Reviews.Title: kindle review
Reviews.Author: Dolly
Reviews.Content: I absolutely loved my original kindle fire,but the kindle fire HDX is amazing,the graphics are so clear.I compared it to the picture on my original kindle and there is a big difference.the May day feature is a life saver for someone who doesn't know how to do very much on a computer.the people who answer your call are wonderful,they are so patient and knowledgeable.lts a great machine,I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: pjhempe2
Reviews.Content: I really like the smaller size from my iPad, however am very disappointed in the camera. I had hoped I would be able to use it to take pictures and video as well as use it for video chat. I returned it and most likely not get the 8.9 because it is not as compact.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: pjhempe2
Reviews.Content: I really like the smaller size from my iPad, however am very disappointed in the camera. I had hoped I would be able to use it to take pictures and video as well as use it for video chat. I returned it and most likely not get the 8.9 because it is not as compact.

Reviews.Title: Great, but needs a couple small tweeks
Reviews.Author: Stan
Reviews.Content: Just needs flash support and a way to reset the "free time" parent password if you forget it. You have to reset the device if you ever forget your password and you'll lose all your apps. Otherwise it's a great little machine!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: E. Hoogland
Reviews.Content: I thought it would be difficult giving up "real" books, but my Kindle is wonderful--I wish I hadn't waited so long to get one. And the features of the Kindle Fire are just enough for me (not too overwhelming for a 60-something)!

Reviews.Title: Very, Very  Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Nichole Zackos
Reviews.Content: I previously owned the original kindle fire which I loved. When I purchased this one the kindle fire HDX I thought it would be as great or better than first one but I was actually disappointed .  My major issues with this kindle are ...The battery  takes so long to charge, dies extremely fast, and even when plugged in does not charge while in use. My previous kindle charged quickly even in use and had an amazing battery life!  I even called customer service and they said there's was a problem with it. Guess what? When I was sent the new one it worked just as bad as before.My next issue is What happened to flash player?!  My old kindle has it! And now when I go to watch certain shows I used to watch or when I go to amazon to view a product video I can't view it anymore!!Next ..  i used to watch the network apps such as the cw ect..  on my previous tablet and still do with no problems. but when i watch them on my HDX they time out whenever the commercial break happens, I have to actually exit the app ,go into my wifi , turn it off, and then back on again to get it to work! Once back in i have to fast foward to where i left off ! This is something i also asked about when in called customer service and was told it was the kindle and my internet. if this were true then why does it work perfectly on the old kindle? Again got the new HDX replaced and still have same issue to this day. It's not my Internet !  I've even been to places that only use one device in there home and have way better internet than me and my kindle still does this ! It was a huge disappointment!In my opinion they took more away and only added a camera.  If they keep this up I don't think I'll be buying anymore kindles in the future. Its sad cause I really did like them and thought the gave apple a good competitor.

Reviews.Title: My favorite toy
Reviews.Author: Mark "mkw"
Reviews.Content: I have lots of electronics, but this is my favorite one.  I use it every day.  I used to think that I preferred to read books on paper, but with this it is far easier.  I especially enjoy reading in bed and don't have to worry about a light disturbing my wife- plus, I use it to do crosswords, Sudoku, check my trading account during the day and more.  Frankly, I like it more than my IPad- it is smaller and easier to carry, and since it cost about 2/3 less, I don't worry about it getting damaged or stolen and I feel like I can take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: best thing to ever be able use in one hand besides a taser in dangerous situation
Reviews.Author: Fadzli Fauzi
Reviews.Content: I've had a huge decision to make between the sub 8inch competitors and I admit, I'm a little bored of having what everyone has so, here I am with a completely new ecosystem that doesn't come with a huge learning curve. Although the restrictions in terms of customization is limited, it gives quality software in return. It's been 3 months now and I must say I'm very impressed especially when I have people come over and try. The first thing they'll be shocked by is the beautiful screen.They've done everything right with the hardware. It's fast and I'm quite sure it'll be future proof for a couple of years. I take this everywhere with me on assignments.The media content from Amazon is 2nd to none. Everyone knows that so I won't get into it. I'm a huge consumer of great music.I gave it a 4 stars because of the lack of information about the gps functionality. I was led to believe it might have one and till now, I don't have clear information about it and because of that, I feel I still need to look for another device all because of one missing functionality.

Reviews.Title: Kindle hurray
Reviews.Author: Margarita Saez
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because the kindle is amazing!!!!it is great to get every movie you wanton is awesome for me

Reviews.Title: awsum,so worth the buy
Reviews.Author: dkremm
Reviews.Content: It's a wonderfully put together electronic book/tablet/calendar/travail alarm clock/journal/video phone/t.v./game console. The screen is crisp and shap, the sound is comparable to a small t.v., and personalizing was a breeze. Navigating thru the apps and all initial set up is very user friendly.The only drawback is the inability to use Google play apps and Google music player( no feeling lucky)Definitely worth the price,especially as its replaced a few other items that I no longer have to find a way to carry; a notebook,, calendar, books I'm reading, language dictionary.

Reviews.Title: My Tablet
Reviews.Author: carmen rosengarten
Reviews.Content: I really like my Kindle, especially I can get books on free to read and play games which I don't have to use really money.  It is a good cheap entertainment to me.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Donna G.
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. The graphics are great. The battery life is excellent.  I love everything about my new Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Fabiola Narvaez
Reviews.Content: This is a good product that was I expected to be because it has a better screen and more features than any other tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: Really enjoy it. Love getting free Prime streaming videos. Enjoying Downtown Abbey for the first time. Also love Fashioning and web surfing on it.

Reviews.Title: my Kindle!!!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Colburn
Reviews.Content: I just love, the color and graphics are excellent. Not sure still how to use everything yet, but I'll learn.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE!!!
Reviews.Author: Shawna
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle, I used to have the Kindle HD but I easily upgraded before my insurance ran out. It's extremely faster now, light weight, the screen is amazingly clear. And the battery life is the best I have ever had. Honestly I love my kindle very much, and so does my boyfriend who always take it from me haha. So if you're thinking of this product to read, go online, play games, etc it is perfect! I highly recommend this product to anyone. Not even including the great price for this item, I got it on sale for $199 which made it even better. I'm completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Best toy ever!
Reviews.Author: Camp Follower "Catriona"
Reviews.Content: My family chose the Kindle Fire HDX 7 over an Ipad mini for my Christmas gift and I am so glad they did. The Kindle works intuitively -- I am a Baby Boomer and electronics do not come easy to me, but the Kindle does. And the special offers make fun screen savers that I ignore or check out at will -- completely non-intrusive.

Reviews.Title: not playing videos
Reviews.Author: trinitechi
Reviews.Content: I thought that I would finally have a convenient way to watch my favourite shows online....I'm yet to be able to see even one episode. They do not play. It works very well for music, reading docucuments and general web page browsing mhm habit video watching I is quite unreliable. I still have to use my slow old computer.

Reviews.Title: FAST AND EASY TO USE  MUCH LIGHTER THAN MY FIRST KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Barbara Moehringer
Reviews.Content: KINDLE #2  FOR ME  LIGHTER THEN MY FIRST KINDLE  AND  THE COLOR IS GREAT  SHARING IT WITH FAMILY IS SUPER EASY

Reviews.Title: Fire
Reviews.Author: jeremiah
Reviews.Content: Got it for gf as Xmas gift. She loves it. Easy to operate and easy to carry with her wherever she goes

Reviews.Title: Never thought I'd want one of these
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Now that I have a Kindle, and an HDX at that, I'm totally sold. I don't have time to read as much as I used to, so I thought having a Kindle would not help me find more time to read, so why buy one? And then I got one for Christmas. I still don't read as many books as I used to, but my Kindle is with me constantly. I love being able to check and send email, interact on my social media accounts, access certain very useful apps, and other activities (including reading short ebooks), during any free moments during the day. Some people would say I'm "too connected" now, but it's the future, and I'm finally joining the action. As a great grandmother, I like being where all my kids are!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: shari
Reviews.Content: I use it so much. I use it for not only reading but gaming, email, and surfing the net.  My grandchildren love it as well. They play games on it too. I don't use my laptop nearly as much.  I would recommend it as a family gift too.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Renee Marmion
Reviews.Content: I just love it!!! Don't know why I waited so long to get one. It's the best. Again love it.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed
Reviews.Author: thomas
Reviews.Content: This tablet rocks!  The HD quality is great.  It is very easy to use, has great battery life, and is light in your hands.  I purchased when Amazon was running a special, it was definitely worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Luis Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet- as a college student I am able to have my books with me everywhere I go. It is just the right size eazy to use and the battery last me longer than the tablets I've had in the past.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7 Expectations
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I have an iPad which works very well for what I  purchased it for; however, after reading about the features of the Kindle Fire HDX 7 and it's capabilities, found it better suited for what I am interested in looking and reading.  Plus, it is easier to carry and store and holds a charge longer.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME KINDLE
Reviews.Author: kaylee-anne rogers
Reviews.Content: It is awesome!!!!! I can't believe that it is so light!!!!!! I can read in the dark with out a flash light.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Alicia
Reviews.Content: Love the clear, crisp picture. Much faster loading pages than my older tablet. Hubby researched it before he bought it and compared it to an iPad with crisper resolution. Takes great pictures!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: christiangal38
Reviews.Content: Got a Kindle Fire HDX for Christmas  I LOVE it since I was using a Kindle reader on my phone and the Kindle Fire really helps with my over 40 eyes.  I would have given it 5 stars but some of the apps will flip upside down when I have the screen locked in one place.  It's not a big deal, just annoying.  Other than that, I LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Paula Jean Rae
Reviews.Content: It does everything I need.  Picture and sound are great for movies and games.  I like the variety of apps available.

Reviews.Title: best multipurpose tablet in medium size
Reviews.Author: Mark Steele
Reviews.Content: I didnt want an iPad and was looking at the iPad mini but i love the Kindle HDX combination of easy to hold size and weight, excellent color and graphics support (video, pix) . It is becoming my preferred  way to read online news and catch up on email (unless i have a lot to type when I prefer a real keyboard.)

Reviews.Title: It is amazing
Reviews.Author: Pamela Lloyd
Reviews.Content: I am  very old fashioned and probably never thought I would own a e-reader but this is so much more,  I actually love reading on it.Because of the size( about the size of a paperback book). and it is so light, it is perfect for taking with me when I am sitting in places waiting or for vacation, and at night I don't  have stacks of books piled up on my bedside table now I just have my kindle.

Reviews.Title: amazing!
Reviews.Author: Tavarie Becker
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it! Does basically everything an iPod does, but it was way more affordable! This is a great purchase for any college student!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: chris north
Reviews.Content: Display and refresh are great!  Fast, compact and light. Text books at my finger tips and games for the kids. Can't beat the deal with Amazon!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire!!!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Cahillane
Reviews.Content: I am an avid reader and always said I wouldn't get a Kindle because I like to goto my local library. I received one for Christmas and couldn't be happier. Now Iwill go to the library and read my Kindle!

Reviews.Title: Kindle wins
Reviews.Author: Michael Wise
Reviews.Content: Great picture, sound, operating system, Freetime is perfect, and miracast is SO cool! This is by far my best experience with a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 7
Reviews.Author: Mimi Weitz "Avid Reader"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is possibly the easiest reader to use, has the best resolution I have seen in a long time and the fact that I can get online help immediately is a big plus.

Reviews.Title: Web cripple
Reviews.Author: stephen malyn
Reviews.Content: Great tab, but until the Flash issue is solved, not perfect. I know they are working on it , but not fixed yet.

Reviews.Title: It's Great
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love it.  It is so easy to run and does so many things.' I seem to learn something new each time I use it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 7 is awesome
Reviews.Author: Shawn Muder
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet.  I thought my first gen Kindle Fire was good, but this one makes it look like an abacus.  So far, I have had little problems with the Kindle.  Only issue is a little screen flicker when reading a book which was significantly reduced when I turned auto-brightness back on.  I love the sharp screen, the X-ray bonus features from IMDB is also nice, since when watching a show or movie I often wonder who is playing who, especially when it's not a main character.  The improved 'carousel' and apps screen is also a nice improvement.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: TFLIII
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is allot of fun!! It has exceeded my expectations. It is very easy to use. As always Amazon delivered as promised.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE  HDX IS NOT AN APPLE
Reviews.Author: MontanaOutdoorsman
Reviews.Content: The screen is sharp and clear, so it is great for reading and watching you tube videos. The reason I only gave it  4 stars is some of the features that come with it don't work as they should. The first one that comes to mind is the speech to text. It works very sporadic. One in three times it will work. What I do like is when it does work it's pretty accurate as far as words. I guess I am somewhat disappointed because we have an IPad and there is no comparison between the two. (In my opinion anyway) the iPad is a lot easier to navigate around on, speech to text always works as well. The touch sceen on the iPad also works a lot smoother and is more accurate. They say the android system is getting the bugs worked out and works as well as Apple.  I have to disagree, because of having both I can do side by side comparisons, and everything I have tried the winner is clearly Apple. If you can afford it the iPad is two times the machine. My opinion only.

Reviews.Title: poor support
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: my unit came with an installed calendar, which was advertized as being able to synch with my outlook calendar on my laptop. when it would not work  I tried manually entering data. even that would not work.  i went to the direct personal support system. they were unable to provide a solution and after a long delay they gave up. I eventually downloaded another calender system which , while not able to synch at least I was able to input data.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX - 7
Reviews.Author: tink1333
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier! My brother just bought the new iPad air & he even had to admit, the Kindle Fire HDX has a greater clarity then any tablet put there on the market.

Reviews.Title: MY WONDERFUL DEVICE!
Reviews.Author: Ricardo from California
Reviews.Content: Is an easy way to surf trough internet. It has the perfect size to handle it. The sound is awesome. I can do almost everything  without a big effort. I really like my kindle fire. (My daughter's christmas gift)

Reviews.Title: Kindle vs Kindle Fire HD vs Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Donna M. Weigel "Donna Weigel"
Reviews.Content: I had a kindle before the Kindle fire ( and I waited for the HD version) that I loved but was becoming limited since I also wanted to convenience of checking email and going on the internet, following links in a ebook etc.  I was so in love with my regular kindle and was a reading fool on that thing. I had a relationship with it. Let’s face it, I slept with it more than I have any man. Lol.  Giving it up and moving on was not an easy decision.Kindle vs Kindle Fire HD vs Fire HDX.Kindle:  Love the light shining on the book rather back lit.  It is far less stressful reading.  The gray background allowed me to read forever easily.  I loved how easy it was to organize books. However, it had become limited.  I couldn’t really surf the internet, magazines and pictures wouldn’t work on it well and it was black and white.  Pretty sure you know the rest.Kindle Fire:  I don’t by the first of anything because it will improve and become cheaper.  The biggest issue with the kindle fire was it didn’t have a reader and I do use that often.  The front page was a bookshelf which is ok but couldn’t organize like the reg kindle.Kindle Fire HD:  I hate the carousel on kindle fire HD.  It’s a circle of icons in which the last thing you opened goes up there.  Want it or not.  You can delete from the carousel but something else will pop up there that is on your device. It has a set number of icons it wants there and it will keep it filled.  Grrr.  I wish it would just go away.  I liked how I could organize my books on the regular kindle.  That said, there are apps that make that happen so it makes life easier. You know there HAS to be an app for that!  Over all the organization isn’t bad. It’s simple to use.  My six year old can use it no problem. But then again, kids are born knowing these things today.  Being back lit vs light shining on the book isn’t as easy to read as the original kindle was.  The back light can be adjusted way down which is a plus. I don’t think this is a big issue to most people.  I’m dyslexic and having dimmer light on the gray background rocked!  I could be a reading fool.  I can’t read as long on this.  As I said though for most people that probably isn’t an issue.  After my withdraw from my original kindle I love this one.  SO much more you can do with it!!  The battery doesn’t last like the original but we are doing WAY more with this one than just read.  AND naturally there is an app for that!!!  There are battery savers that shut down what isn’t needed and does make a difference in battery life.  Considering with I do however I think the battery isn’t bad. I play music and a game at the same time or music and read, music and read.  I am asking a lot! I was use to the other battery lasting for weeks.  One plus is my phone charger works for the kindle.  I’m just overall too happy with the upgrade to Kindle Fire HD.HD vs HDX.I got the HD with Ads because I didn’t care to pay to not have them. I’m really glad I did that.  I like the ads.  There were some movie and TV trailers that I would have otherwise missed.  Product ads you never know but they aren't annoying at all.My son bought the HDX.  He loves it.As far as I can tell the big difference is with the HDX you can have Wifi and cell towers.  Oh and the live help.  I asked if I could upgrade because it came out right after I bought my HD. The answer was no, I would need to sell it myself.  I’m glad I didn’t. I don’t need to use cell towers.  Some might where they live but I don’t.  As for live help, once you learn your kindle do you really need that?  I didn’t for the price difference.  Last I knew it was a good $200 difference.  I’m sure the price will go down, the HD will be priced at peanuts and it will all balance out in time.  It seems about a year is when the big price change happens.Good luck with your new decisions!

Reviews.Title: I had a Kindle Fire before
Reviews.Author: Katgirl2
Reviews.Content: I used my Kindle Fire for 2 years before getting my Kindle Fire HDX.  I always loved my 'regular' Kindle, but love the HDX even ,ore! It loads much faster, is more clear and has more GBs than the older model.  I can now take pics and store/edit/save them - I didn't realize how much of a difference that makes to me (even if I can only take the pics from the front of the Kindle with this model).  It was super easy to transfer the books that I had purchased from one device to the other. . . I was happily surprised.I do not like the one and only cover option for this newer tablet.  I have knocked it off a few times, as it is only 'held' on by magnets (it IS nice that it folds into a stand, though).  I am not taking any stars off of my rating because of the cover.I would buy another one in a heartbeat, if needed - it is that nice.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Pamela Ley
Reviews.Content: I am loving my new Kindle HDX.  I got it for Christmas and have read more books since getting it than I've read in a year.  They're much cheaper and accessible.  Plus I can read in bed while my husband sleeps since I don't need to have a light on anymore.  I can get on the Internet quickly and don't have to drag around my big laptop.  It's also convenient for checking my email.  The only draw back is that the camera lens is on the front (facing you) so the only thing you can really do is take selfies, which I DON'T do.  But it does take great pictures as long as you can aim the lens just right.  Other than that it's great!!

Reviews.Title: I love my little computer!
Reviews.Author: Cheri
Reviews.Content: I love the smaller size (same size as my older Kindle). I can easily take it wherever I go. Lot of free apps (Facebook, email, games; skype, movies and TV shows, Netflix, the web, Amazon shopping, and many more). I LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX 7"!!!  Cheryl Metz

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Janet P Brown
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle! Ease of downloading, perfect size and weight. Great for reading books and listening to music. Also great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: It's Okay
Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: Compared to a nexus 7 which is the same price, the HDX seems to have a slower processor.  It's not as snappy as I would like it to be.  Kindle has a proprietary App Store.  Some apps I really enjoy on my android nexus 5 I can't get on the HDX without sideloading.  I don't feel like I should have side load.  The HDX has a front facing camera, but lacks a rear facing camera.  All in all it's okay, but I feel I could have done better with my 200 bucks by getting a nexus 7.

Reviews.Title: HDX
Reviews.Author: Finnan
Reviews.Content: Awesome awesome really awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome totally awesome really cool so awesome it's really impressive and amazing you should get it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX my favorite toy
Reviews.Author: jujamsamsu
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle Fire HDX.  The only thing that I would like to see is a larger screen at the same price.  THE FIRE HDX IS DOING EVERYTHING THAT WE WERE TOLD THAT IT WOULD.  I really like the help button.  It's great that you can see who you are talking to. Keep up the great work Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great small tablet
Reviews.Author: Andrew Vittoria
Reviews.Content: I have had the Fire for about a month and love it. It's easy to use, has tons of apps and books that arevery reasonably priced. The screen resolution is perfect. All that and under $175. What's not to love?

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I started with a Kindle Fire and loved it for reading new or revisiting books I hadn't read in some time.  The new Kindle Fire HDX is a great advancement over the original.  Portability, ease of use, can go from reading a book to surfing the web or watching a Netflix video seamlessly. The Silk browser is a huge leap forward from the Kindle Fire and is very fast and responsive. The only con I have found so far is in the native e-mail application.  It works extremely well but it does not have a "select all" option when you need to move or delete e-mail, you have to select each one individually.  This is a minor quibble but would make the mail app shine (yes I know I have other options).  Now if I could just convince my significant other that the HDX 8.9" would be even better (or the 10" when it becomes available...)

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "lilimarlene9"
Reviews.Content: I can do anything I want on it. I only wish I had spent the extra money & gotten the 3G option also.

Reviews.Title: Best Gift Ever
Reviews.Author: robert carter
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter as a Christmas present.... To date this has been the best gift she's ever had... Her words... The help feature is awesome! Live person interaction on your screen is truly awesome... I strongly recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Susan K. Epley "Susibo"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my boyfriend. Not only was he surprised, but he was so happy with the fact it was HD. Got it at a great price

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Sheldon
Reviews.Content: The kindle performs well, has a great display, a wide amount of apps (not as many as google play though), easy to type on, and is perfect for browsing the internet (especially Reddit). After a month of ownership the only problem I have with it is the screen occasionally has a fit of fast flickering, like the auto brightness is spazing out even though I have that disabled. I would give it a 9.5 out of 10

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 7"
Reviews.Author: Ron Price
Reviews.Content: Great little tablet..works good..light and easy to carry. Battery holds up well..speakers could have more volume. I would tell anyone that this is a great tablet.

Reviews.Title: 3 Kindles in this house!!!
Reviews.Author: JML in Jersey
Reviews.Content: My kids each have one and they love it!  GREAT for soooo many reasons!  They love it for reading, games, taking pictures, etc.!My husband also has one and LOVES it as well for same reasons stated and so much more!I think it is affordable and so worth it!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 7"
Reviews.Author: Jennifer m
Reviews.Content: I got these for my kids and they love them..the picture is very clear and the tablet is very light..there is lots of storage for videos, music, apps etc..my main gripe is that you can only use the amazon appstore..it is not compatible with google play or itunes which is huge disadvantage because there are a lot of games that are only available through google play. my daughter really wanted the furby boom app for her furby and we found out later it was only available through google play..

Reviews.Title: saved the day during hospital stay
Reviews.Author: Loretta Lurer
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Recently had a stay in hospital and my son gave me my Kindle Fire to help pass the time and also access my netflix account.

Reviews.Title: Luv the new kindle!!!
Reviews.Author: Christine Fox
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle.  The resolution is awesome.  I luv the portability of the HDX 7.  So many things to do.  Read books, check mail, stream.

Reviews.Title: fun cool tite
Reviews.Author: isaac goodwin
Reviews.Content: Was cool awesome title cool always good to know that you are going well with your family and friends and family

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire  HDX
Reviews.Author: peggy paterson
Reviews.Content: Given  this as a Christmas present..am still learning all details, but love its portability and convenience. I recommend it Highly

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT! :D :)
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Gillam
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle fire HDX!  I am so glad got it for Christmas! :):):)I am so happy with it! :):):)

Reviews.Title: better than expected
Reviews.Author: A. Taylor
Reviews.Content: Purchased 3 of the these for Christmas. Great gifts. All who received loved them. My 8 year old has a hard time putting it down. Spends a lot of time on "FreeTime" and Amazon prime..

Reviews.Title: pro and con
Reviews.Author: Trudie J. Ellenberger
Reviews.Content: Difficult to read on a sunny beach but great everywhere else. Easy to use and  lightweight. Holds its charge well.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablets for both kids
Reviews.Author: fluffy feet
Reviews.Content: I bought two kindle Fire HDX 7's for Christmas for my girls.  The graphics are crystal clear and they are easy to use.  Plenty of apps to choose from along with some free books.  I am planning on getting a tablet when I finish my MBA and no longer need my laptop as much.  I will consider buying the 8.9" Kindle when I get there (late 2014).

Reviews.Title: The best tablet ever!!
Reviews.Author: Mitzi Means
Reviews.Content: Got Kindle Fire HDX AS a gift for myself for Christmas. Not knowing anything about tablets and am not a "techy", I was unsure but decided to give it a try. Got it home and MAN it was so easy to use, easy to navigate and is lightening fast, plus it hold a good battery charge. I would highly recommend this tablet. NO REGRETS.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Judy Jakob
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I got a Tablet last year for Christmas (2012), and I don't even use that anymore. The Kindle is so much easier to use. It also have more free games to download. And I enjoy the hundred free books app.My son also uses it when I let him.

Reviews.Title: useless outside of the united states.
Reviews.Author: dustin
Reviews.Content: I bought the HDX so that I could possibly use the features of Amazon Prime, and the front facing camera for my time spent in Thailand. Amazon Prime streaming will not work in Thailand, and to use the photos or video taken with the device, you have to link the device to your Facebook, and sign away all rights to privacy for you and anyone on your friends list. I refuse to sell out all my friends and family just so I can post a video message. So now I am in Thailand with only a device that I can simply browse the web with and check my messages. I will immediately get rid of the device when I am back in the states and buy an IPad.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: isamara cotto
Reviews.Content: It's awesome I can use it for everything and anything. It's very practical and fun. I recommend it to everyone and anyone. Including kids

Reviews.Title: Disappointed. Got blue screen & lost data
Reviews.Author: Samuel Smith
Reviews.Content: I loved it until I got a blue screen twice in less than 15 min and lost all my data for a game I had almost finished.  Amazon's mayday person apologized that I lost data but said there was nothing he could do and had never personally heard about a blue screen but in the next breath said he had when I said other people online said to hold power button for 20 seconds when get blue screen.  I am really disappointed. It was a Christmas present.

Reviews.Title: On Fire for Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: S.Martin
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 7 is great. I love it. The price is right, it's so easy to use, light weight, movie watching is fantastic and Amazon has so many wonderful apps! It's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Linda Genevie
Reviews.Content: I purchased my first kindle about 4 years ago and loved it.  When the Kindle Fire came out I was a little afraid of the technology.  My son bought it for me for Christmas and it is so easy to use.  I never leave home without it.

Reviews.Title: get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Kc
Reviews.Content: Low battery life. Does not work with sites that requires flash player. Every time I turn the tablet on I get  advertising. Cannot turn it off.

Reviews.Title: great keeps child busy
Reviews.Author: Cristen
Reviews.Content: this is great for kids to learn and have fun. easy to navigate.can keep an eye on what they select.also teaches them to only buy what is necessary

Reviews.Title: Best for binge watching HD TV and movies
Reviews.Author: Andrew Swartzmiller
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is great for Netflix and Amazon prime. The picture quality is absurd. The only downfall is no Google play store access.

Reviews.Title: We like it so far
Reviews.Author: thomas patrell
Reviews.Content: It's all new to us  not like our laptop but good for reading The mayday button is the best thing I ever seem in any device I have used can't believe it's so easy to use. we get answers instantly no waiting and if they don't the answer to our question they get a tech that does Thank god for Mayday

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: bookitty
Reviews.Content: Received this as a Christmas gift, gave it 4 stars because it was not easy to transfer my books from my old Kindle onto the "FIRE HDX.I would recommend this to anyone that is looking to upgrade from the original Kindle

Reviews.Title: not sure if this is a lemon or not
Reviews.Author: Mary Bosworth
Reviews.Content: i got this particular model so i could have internet/ wifi anywhere.  So far that hasn't happened.it has dropped / deleted  my email account I've now  loaded twice.  We're on the third time to reload. i contacted customer service and it took them a week to send a canned email with instructions on how to load an email.  i'm out of the country with no email access - the exact reasoni went and spent $350 to prevent happening.  Next time i will take the ipad.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Tate M.
Reviews.Content: I really like the kindle fire it helps me in school and the games and graphics are amazing and I absolutely love it

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle fire HDX7
Reviews.Author: cynthia
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle HDX7 it is just what I want for what I do. This little thin is incredible, small light and very easy to learn.Highly recommend it to every on. My husband has my kindle fire and loves it

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: golf4ever
Reviews.Content: Battery life is not as advertised. Other than that it's a nice tablet. I will be going back to Apple when I need a new one.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Tonda Jean Jones
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing tablet. The color is off the chart. It's easy to use and offers many apps. If you are a beginner or expert. I would recommend this Kindle to anyone looking at tablets. This was my best Christmas present ever.....

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle is a HDX 7
Reviews.Author: OldandintheWay@58
Reviews.Content: I really like my new HDX 7. I don't mind that it is only wifi. I can down load what I need at home and take it with me to where ever.I like the easy down loads. I've enjoyed some games on it. I have been able to Skype with it and I use it to check the Weather Channel. I do a little Face Book time and it works well for that too.Money well spent I think.

Reviews.Title: this thing rocks!
Reviews.Author: Clinton Gray
Reviews.Content: I love it so far. The battery does not last as long as advertised when watching video but that's a minor problem.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: carolyn gibbs
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle Fire and it's so much better than the first one. It's thinner and light weight, small enough tocarry in my purse. The colors are richer and sound is much better. The built in camera is so nice and takes anexcellent picture. I would recommend this 7" HDX to anyone who loves to read or play games. The E-mail apptis much easier to read. I have no negative comments.

Reviews.Title: Depends on what you want.
Reviews.Author: ann wilson
Reviews.Content: To tell the truth I like my old original Kindle better.  The new Fire is harder to read a book on because of the glare of the pages.  Much prefer the old one's easy on the eyes screen.  I don't like the dictionary at all.  You have to page through from a to z to find the word you want.  Waste of time.  I don't much care for the games that are available.  I like word games.  I play several every day such as crossword and Scrabble on my old Kindle.  The choice of games on Fire are mostly juvenile ones with sound effects which are irritating and most of them will only let you play a game or two without paying the company who created them more money.  On the old Kindle you pay for a game up front and play to your heart's content.  I also don't like how frequently it needs recharging - even when it's just sitting around doing nothing it needs a recharge in no time.  I do like that I can pick up my email without starting up the computer. I can check it while I'm sitting around watching TV, etc.  However, you can't trash the email on your computer from your Fire, so you end up trashing it from the Kindle, then when you get into your computer, the emails are still there and you have to go through the process again..  I also don't like the front only camera.  It's very hard to take a decent picture with it because you can't see what you're focusing on.  Perhaps going up to the next level would have been better, but that was a great deal more expensive.  I'd say this is an okay device if you like to play the games a lot, don't use the dictionary very much, either don't read a lot of books or have young eyes.  But if you have an old Kindle you like for reading, word games , the dictionary and thesauras, stick with the black and white.

Reviews.Title: I do like it!!
Reviews.Author: Wayne Draper
Reviews.Content: Like the display.  Like the books and apps available at no or little cost.Just what I wanted.  It is a great traveling companion!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet
Reviews.Author: Courtney Hayden
Reviews.Content: The kindle is lightweight, easy to read, has wonderful display, and does everything I would like a tablet to do. I have only two issues: user error and screen resolution. While I love the kindle, I am used to Apple products. I am learning how to use my kindle by trial and error. I would have liked to have some form of user guide so I could know more about its functions and how to use them. The only other problem I have noticed is with the screen resolution. I have noticed my screen flickers when I am using an app that has color (basically everything except reading). It's not something totally noticeable but there are times when it disrupts my use with my kindle and I put it down thinking it needs a break.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Debbie Colmar
Reviews.Content: Not very techno  smart Got this for a Christmas gift,wasn't sure I'd use much . It has replaced my laptop.love it..love it. Easy to navigate.love exploring  all the options!!Thank

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Dave Meadows
Reviews.Content: Meets my needs and the price was right. The definition of the screen is outstanding. Once I learn all the tricks I  anticipate maximum use.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Pat Witman
Reviews.Content: This was a surprise Christmas present from my husband.  I hadn't considered this when I've been looking at tablets, but was I surprised by this little powerhouse.  Perfect size to fit in my hand or purse, great screen (I've had it outside and I have no trouble reading in sunlight), have loaded multiple books (loved that it automatically loaded what was on the Kindle reader on my smartphone to the tablet), and love how the oragimi cover keeps it at the perfect angle to search/read recipes in the kitchen when I'm cooking.  Now if Pampered Chef will just make a Kindle version of its mobile app, it would be perfect!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 7
Reviews.Author: Debra Bruce
Reviews.Content: I chose the kindle fire hdx 7 because I love to read and my sister suggested this product might be something I would be interested in owning. I have only been using it for a few weeks and so far it has been very entertaining learning about all the different features the kindle has and it is definitely nice having books on it to read. I look forward to utilizing the other features on my kindle.

Reviews.Title: Beyond awesome
Reviews.Author: ken lee
Reviews.Content: It's the best tablet I've ever had the opportunity to use ....stomps on the Google Nexus ..got the fastest processor ..runs games movies videos everything smooth as silk.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7", HDX Display  I like it because it is lighter than previous ones
Reviews.Author: Joann N. Robinson
Reviews.Content: I wish the on/off button was located on the top or side in stead  of the bottom.  I have to take it out of the case  to start and to shut it down.  There must be a better place for that  button.I do like  the Kindle Fire

Reviews.Title: like
Reviews.Author: Darcia
Reviews.Content: I like the new kindle fire. I have more app on my fire then my ipad. I like the home page better. many likes.

Reviews.Title: Love the kindle.
Reviews.Author: Audrey Herley
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle and I am happy with the performance and function of the kindle. Love May day to guide me through additional functions to learn..

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: The kindle hdx is awesome. It's so portable and more convenient than a laptop. I'm able to anything from play games to read books to do homework

Reviews.Title: Much better!
Reviews.Author: Karen Lester
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle Fire and love it!! So my husband got me the HDX for Christmas and WOW!!! So much better, better than an Ipad....the only thing is, I would like if there was a light to let you know if it's fully charged, I miss that on it!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx

Reviews.Content: i am 71 and received my kindle fire hdx for christmas from my son and daughter inlaw. Absolutely love it. Easy to use and if you do have a question great customer service if quickly available.

Reviews.Title: Best Christmas Gift Received
Reviews.Author: Samuel Notarangelo
Reviews.Content: Received one for Christmas and am enjoying it greatly.  Did not realize all the Apps available for this tablet and functionality this tablet provides.

Reviews.Title: Even a noob can use it
Reviews.Author: ursen
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet/ereader of any kind.  Even with a lack of clear basic information it has been fairly easy to figure it out.  Taking baby steps has been easy and I have learned a lot.  Lots of media and books available.  One big quibble though.  It does not take an SD card for memory expansion.  Otherwise I would give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: beautiful
Reviews.Author: Marcy Doehlman
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. The colors are vibrant and the battery really last a long time. My Granddaughter plays games on it and loves it too now she does not have to play them on my little phone. The books are great and the photos.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: shawna buchanan
Reviews.Content: I can do anything on it, I get to check email, check Facebook and enjoy shopping. The camera is awesome... I love my Kindle Fire HDX...

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: First of all I'd like to say this product was bought for my mother for Christmas/Birthday since they were only a few weeks apart. I didn't need a high end laptop or a desktop with an i7 processor or any kind of powerhouse. I just needed something with good processing power, an HD display, and something simple so that my mother could browse the web and watch Netflix or something. The product came with the standard usb/wall charger and nothing more, but you don't need anything else. After registering the device it was good to go. The quality is superb, transitioning between apps and things are easy and fluid, and it even has a headphone jack so you can hear media in peace or without disturbing others. The only thing my mother wanted, though, was to play Papa Pear Saga and it isn't compatible with the Kindle Fire.All in all this product was more than enough for my mother. She was happy with the product and I was happy to see my mother happy. The only thing I didn't like, which has nothing to do with the product itself, was that Amazon had the May-Day $30 off Kindle's sale right after I ordered it so I kinda missed out on a greater deal. I'd recommend this to anyone who just plans to browse the web, check Facebook, watch YouTube or Netflix, or something like Skype.

Reviews.Title: Soo disappointed
Reviews.Author: Kristin Gilpatrick
Reviews.Content: My only love about it is the camera. It sucks there's not one on the back though. I hate the browser and I hate the flash player and I hate you can't have snapchat(the app). There is another browser you can download to watch videos on but after a while that one catches so many viruses I had to delete it. I'm pretty much contemplating going back to my 1st generation fire...

Reviews.Title: Won't Connect to my Wireless Router
Reviews.Author: Ziggs
Reviews.Content: I continuously have problems with my Kindle not hooking up to my wireless, which in turn makes it a pretty useless device.

Reviews.Title: eh .
Reviews.Author: Leslie gill
Reviews.Content: The fact that you cannot customize anything is annoying beyond belief and there's and advertisement every time you turn it on or in lock it is ridiculous no I don't want to buy a dirt devil thank you. Also the power and volume buttons are on the back of the device which is a terrible design feature if u have it in a case bc u have to take it out every time you want to turn it on or change the volume.  Other than that it's pretty decent could have a better camera and a back facing one ...I did return it for a galaxy tablet that I am much more happy with.

Reviews.Title: my kids loved it...
Reviews.Author: Diana  Melissa
Reviews.Content: Very happy!!!! It was a Christmas presents for my kids and they love it I recommend not only for the games now they are reading more books

Reviews.Title: It would have been 5 stars except...
Reviews.Author: Douglas Dickerson "codougd"
Reviews.Content: ... for the annoying carousel and the fact that there is no way to disable it.Overall, the Kindle HDX is exactly as I expected and fits my needs, as planned and anticipated.The Kindle is NOT a "general purpose" tablet replacement or competitor. Its strengths are aimed squarely at us members of the Amazon ecosystem.It is a very good ereader. The color screen is crisp and, as a color screen, is more suitable for technical volumes than the B&W; Kindles. The is some glare in bright light but that is the trade-off for color.The included apps are good enough. I appreciate being able to jump to a browser to research something I encounter in book I am reading. The Silk browser is much improved over previous instances. The mail app is also good enough for casual use.I don't watch videos on the Kindle so I can't comment on the performance at that task. I have watched some video tutorials using the browser and that worked well.In all, if you accept that the Kindle is a media consumption device with hooks into and dependencies upon the Amazon ecosystem and if that is why you bought it you will be very happy. If you buy it as a cheaper alternative to other Android-based tablets you will likely be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: WIFI Connectivity
Reviews.Author: Lucy Cardona, Ph.D., LCSW
Reviews.Content: I was very ambivalent about returning the new Kindle Fire HDX 7" which I ordered one week ago.  This is because the HDX 7 has a great high definition display, is easy to use, and seemed to have better connectivity to the internet than did my old Kindle Fire. Today, I was at Starbucks, where I tried connecting to the internet through their free WIFI service, but failed to connect. I had not tried connecting in other environments other than in my home where I have high sped internet through a cable company. Thus, I ran into the very same connectivity issues that I had with my old Kindle. This was very disappointing as I had been reassured by the Amazon chat tech that the connectivity problems had been significantly improved (in the HDX 7'). For this reason, I made the decision not to order the 4G internet (Verizon) with it and ordered solely the WIFI connection for it. I am returning the device in the morning. I will explore other Kindle Fire products and likely order a more expensive model but this time, include the 4G (Verizon) with it.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Robert Hurst
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I finally bought a Kindle HDX.  Not disappointed one bit as it met all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: the Fire is epic
Reviews.Author: Evil Sandwitch
Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire is epic, every thing loads fast and so far every 3D app i've tried has had no problems. only two things i dislike: The Boot up time after you turn it off is slow, and the fact that i can't use Google Play.

Reviews.Title: Hot to trot!
Reviews.Author: msdale
Reviews.Content: I lost my Kindle Fire HD so, after looking for weeks, decided to buy another but thought I'd "step up" to the next level. It is lighter in weight and as easy to use as the HD. I had to figure out where the buttons are but really like the style.Easy to use, easy to read, great colors and graphics.

Reviews.Title: TOTALLY LOVE MY NEW KINDLE!!!!
Reviews.Author: NORMA
Reviews.Content: I totally love my new Kindle... upgrade to my 2nd edition.  Don't get me wrong I love my previous Kindle and I plan to keep it since I have notices that it allow you see more Audiobook similar than the new one.  I also love the idea of having help at my fingertips with the MayDay button!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Penny Canter
Reviews.Content: Although I didn't purchase the Kindle for 'reading' I really like the convenience of having all the books I am reading together and easy to carry anywhere. I was looking for something smaller than my laptop, yet bigger than my cell phone, for quick and easy internet access.The kindle is just the right size.

Reviews.Title: It's Another Winner!
Reviews.Author: Linda T
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. He's not real computer savvy and this is his first tablet and he's been able to do all the things without having to "call for help" from me or the helpful person at Amazon. He downloaded a movie on it and the sharpness and clarity of both the picture and the sound were great. I have one of the older Kindle fires and I can't wait to upgrade to this new one.

Reviews.Title: Another great product.
Reviews.Author: jason
Reviews.Content: Got it for Christmas and glad I waited for the HDX instead of getting the hd model. It's super fast. It's got Miracast but unfortunately my tv doesn't support it so I can't make it mirror the screen on to the tv. Oh well.

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Norma
Reviews.Content: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE. it works great and my faimly can use for various different sites, apps and books on it,

Reviews.Title: size wise, it's the best.
Reviews.Author: Carol Keelek
Reviews.Content: I am not "into" electronics, so the ease of using this Kindle is nice.  It is easier to use than  the original which I also own.  the only down side is the sensitivity is so intense that pages change and directionality of the display even when I have not intended it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product
Reviews.Author: ChuckB
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present for my wife.  I own an original fire and was amazed at how much better the display is on the hdx.  A new fire went on my birthday list as soon as I saw it.

Reviews.Title: Love this product, would recommend!
Reviews.Author: Stacey Sherman
Reviews.Content: Nice product and very easy to use. Love the detail and size. Color is very nice! My son can use it to with no problem.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: nicole
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT THIS AS A GIFT FOR MY MOTHER (WHO IS FOR LACK OF BETTER WORDS CHALLENGED WHEN IT COMES TO TECHNOLOGY). SHE ACTUALLY MANAGED TO GET THE HANG OF IT FAIRLY EASY AND ENJOYS READING BOOKS AND GOING ONLINE. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS BUY!

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I can't believe I kicked the book in hand habit.  It's shocking for me still.  I love this HDX Kindle.  I perhaps would have liked the buy the double camera better but I didn't realize the camera only shoots forward at yourself rather than a normal pic (unless I'm missing something).  But it probably wouldn't been worth the money.  The colors on this kindle fire are fantastic.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: I love this device!
Reviews.Author: A. Bell
Reviews.Content: I normally don't write reviews, even when I like something. But I LOVE THIS THING! The display is sharp as a razor blade, its size makes it feel great in the hand, or lying in bed reading. The UI is intuitive and fast. Lots of good apps.We have an iPad for a couple of years, and I really have only used that to surf the internet. The Kindle Fire HDX does surfing just fine, but as far as I am concerned it blows the iPad away when it comes to making reading books and magazines comfortable.I was a little worried about  "Special Offers" but they barely even get in the way.So impressed!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: I'm Paulette "Paulette"
Reviews.Content: Birthday present for my daughter.  She absolutely loves it! This is an awesome tablet at a great price; highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire hdx !
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I own an iPad 10inch. I wanted a smaller tablet but did not want to spend all that money ona iPad mini. I have a co-worker who has a Kindle HDX 7 and she loves hers so I decided to get one myself and so I'm so glad I did. I love that it's a size of a book n it works absolutely great. I love amazon n I'm a prime member. I love to read books n the Kindle fire it's so easy to carry around. I love that there are lots of movies you can download n watch without wifi. So if you go on a trip you can down load some movies or tv shows n watch them anywhere. The kindle fire has a clear beautiful screen. It's great to play games n also it has two speakers n that makes a difference. some people say that the speakers are not that loud. I have an iPad with one speaker n the Kindle sounds a lot better. I also like the special offers, it's nice to see what deals are going on. They only appear when you wake up the Kindle. Once you swipe to activate the Kindle there is no interruption with the special offers. I'm really enjoying the Kindle fire hdx. I'm not disappointed at all. I like it more than my iPad. I purchased the 32gb. More than enough for me. I think it's a great buy n I would recommend the Kindle hdx. Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Jason Block
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet overall, the only con is the batter life. The display is great and runs very well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Ernesto Tirado
Reviews.Content: Perfect fit and practical functionality. Can convert to work as a stand or handheld with attached elastic strap to use on the go. Recommend this product. Priced right and delivery as described.

Reviews.Title: AMAZON'S best
Reviews.Author: Old but hip
Reviews.Content: I love it! Sure it is an access devise for anything AMAZON, but what's wrong with that? I have an AMAZON PRIME account and I am able to watch free videos all day from the extensive list of movies, TV shows, and specials. I can check my e-mail, go online, check my FACEBOOK page and choose from hundreds of free and low priced APPS. The screen resolution is top notch, stereo speakers are loud and easy to adjust. All in all a great device, well worth the low price.

Reviews.Title: Great for Grandpa!
Reviews.Author: Susan Key Shelton
Reviews.Content: Great product for my dad who had no experience with electronics! We haven't had a lot of time to walk him through some basic things, I like knowing he can get a rep at the push of a button that will help him with anything.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I understand the previous HD version had a HDMI output.  An HDMI output would have been good for the HDX also.

Reviews.Title: Small but capable
Reviews.Author: Stuart I. Riley
Reviews.Content: This is not the smallest e-reader or tablet, but the one filled to the brim with features, gorgeous display and easy viewing. Movies, books, audio, and apps all run in superior order, with the only down side, is memory expandability (an extra slot for loading more solid state memory as a card). That is a very minor factor, given its rich feature set, brilliant display and ease of viewing a movie or playing an action game.  It met my expectations and more.

Reviews.Title: Just the right size!
Reviews.Author: Andrea L. Gillan
Reviews.Content: My new Kindle is easy to take with me wherever I go. Fits snuggly in my purse. Like having a library at my fingertips. The screen displays are crisp and easy to use. It is becoming indispensable.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Grammy Pammy
Reviews.Content: This is so clear and wonderful.  This is my 3rd Kindle and my favorite. I love the size. very easy to read.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7
Reviews.Author: Brenda K. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 7 is the best gift I've given in a long while, my son has enjoyed it since Christmas day and has become a real fan. like he says, it does it all, and the graphics are great and so easy to take along wherever you go. Kindle has become a big name in the family, and were ready to purchase several more. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Tim Theriac
Reviews.Content: Great for reading books and the w-fi feature makes it very handy. Still figuring out all the cool things it can do.

Reviews.Title: Would I buy this again? You bet..
Reviews.Author: LoriD "Lori"
Reviews.Content: I am totally impressed with the kindle HDX. I can have books, facebook, an appointment calendar and e-mail all on one device. I also have the weather and am able to get radio stations from just about every state in the United States. The notepad app. is a nice feature. You can take notes wherever you are without pencil and paper. If you join Prime you can borrow a book a month from the lending library and you can watch movies and videos for free. It's amazing what one little device can do. This is my first tablet so really wasn't very educated on what to do with it but I'm learning and adding things each day. I'm especially grateful for the May day feature. A tech will connect in seconds to give you help. I've been impressed with how nice everyone is and how helpful they are. Couldn't find better people. I started with an e-reader and moved up to the HDX and I am so happy I did. If you're thinking of a tablet check this one out.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my spouse and he loves it. We were not aware that we would have to purchase a plan for the $G, but the WiFi he is using now is very fast

Reviews.Title: Over all very sattisfied.
Reviews.Author: Dennis Miller
Reviews.Content: It's use and ability to get items through it is good.over all it is easy to use.I would tell my friends and family to buy the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Pros and cons of my kindle
Reviews.Author: Arthur L. Eberly, Jr. MD
Reviews.Content: A fun efficient affordable tablet. I enjoy the display of my kindle library along with other frequently used apps. I amdissapointed in the lack of an instruction book, so far I have had to turn off the kindle once i put Pandora on because to my knowledge there is other way to get it off. If I switch to another app while pandora is on, it just keeps playing.I also have trouble attempting to put an outside(of amazon) app on the display screen to come on when I start the kindle up....A. L. Eberly

Reviews.Title: SERIOUSLY NICE REPLACEMENT FOR MY OLDER KINDLE
Reviews.Author: James Hirschy
Reviews.Content: Nice unit.  Had no issues with replacing the previous kindle.It is a great entertainment device.  Small and incredible color and featuresI would recommend this unit for avid readers - the video feature is good and the social media aspects okayHowever, a really good product and clearly worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: J. Edwards "J. Edwards"
Reviews.Content: Enjoying it. Especially the ability to make payments instead of having to come up with the money all at once. Still like my Paper White, though.

Reviews.Title: Really Diggin It
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I was finally able to pick on these up when Amazon offered a year-long payment option. So far I've had a pretty experience with it. Adding this to a mainly iOS collection was a bit of a struggle at first (still is a bit), with regards to navigating the software and remembering where the buttons on the machine are. Those are obvious initial speed bumps though, and they haven't been that bad. I've been very happy with the sharpness of the screen. Very happy. Movies look great, games look great, photos and games look great. I've burned through three books on this thing and it's been great. The Send To Kindle app is such a neat thing, I've been able to send documents straight from my Mac to the Kindle over wifi, which is so simple and genius. The only thing I haven't figured out quite yet is if the battery always drains as fast, or if there are apps running the background and I'm just not sure how to turn them off completely. It's a simple thing to do on my iPad Mini. Between the Mini and the Kindle I prefer the interface of the Mini, but the size and screen of the Kindle. The Kindle is definitely my go-to for reading now, and the Mini will remain my game/entertainment machine, mostly because the app store is leaps and bounds ahead of anything else. I definitely recommend this to someone who's in the market and doesn't have a tablet of any kind, but I'm unsure if I'd recommend it to someone who already does have one.

Reviews.Title: My third Kindle and I love it too.
Reviews.Author: So.Calif.Grandma
Reviews.Content: I use this Kindle as an alternate computer.  I read books with my 2nd Kindle (white background) and what really surprised me was every book I purchased on my other 2 kindles is on this one.  So when I travel I only take the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Perfect tablet!
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Amazing device. Does everthing all the other tablets do. Very easy to use and helpful mayday button when needed. Good size screen and colors.

Reviews.Title: Wife and I Love this Tablet
Reviews.Author: Thomas M Alexander
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my wife for Christmas.  It was a pain reading the reviews of all of the different tablets and trying to decide on which one to go with.  The screen resolution, colors, and brightness as well as the sound quality cannot be matched by the other tablets out there.  Add a google prime account to this little guy and you'll be very happy, as we are.  Can't go wrong!  Edit: I got her the Otter Box case, Marware Capacitive Stylus, as well as the rapid charger and she was equally delighted with those as well! Edit2: We have used the mayday button on our kindle twice in order to get a bit of assistance learning the navigation at first, then to get assistance when it froze up one time. Customer service is incredible for many reasons.  First, because the person helping you gets connected immediately, no time waiting on the phone, second they are instantly remoted in and can see and help you live on your screen, third, they offered to replace the kindle at the drop of a hat if it freezes up.  We decided to update the device and keep some background apps closed and see how it goes.  It is a big relief that Amazon is very concerned at keeping us happy with this product.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: love reading on my kindlefire
Reviews.Author: J. Albert "Bluedragonfly"
Reviews.Content: As much as I love paper books, I love my KindleFire. It's nice to be able to read something instantly, and I can't afford Prime but I enjoyed the free trial.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: DENNIS SIMS
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with easy ability to operate. I'm not very computer literate, but have not any problems. My granddaughter has an older version, and we enjoy spending time together working on our kindles.

Reviews.Title: The best tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: Marshal
Reviews.Content: The new Kindle Fire HDX is the best you can buy on the market.  No problems with it at all!!! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tablet!
Reviews.Author: Keith D. Chapman
Reviews.Content: Great improvements over previous Kindle. Much better on wi-fi. Brilliant display. Would recommend to friends and family. Convenient size. Better than competing tablets tried.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: just as advertised I used the product on a 7 hr flight.  Long battery life, Crystal clear picture. Decent sound

Reviews.Title: Battery life
Reviews.Author: Deb "grannydeb47"
Reviews.Content: Not to happy with the battery life.  So far can use it for about 3 hrs before charging it.  Already went threw the hints on how to save battery life.  Not sure what else I can do to not have to charge it constantly.

Reviews.Title: How did I live without it?
Reviews.Author: S. Simons "MOM of  SGT TR"
Reviews.Content: After having a 'regular' kindle for 3 years, I decided to update (as a gift for myself) to a Fire HDX...WOW! ...such vivid pictures, and the ability to increase the print size with a touch of my finger is amazing!  I had over 400 books on my original, and they are there (in the cloud) or I can move them back and forth. I love having my Bible on my Fire, as well as several of my favorite cookbooks. I have even downloaded Craftsy classes and view those seamlessly as I sew right along! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my new Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Fire Hands Down
Reviews.Author: David Cripe
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire HDX during the cyber-Monday special of $179, which was totally worth it as that price.  My family has owned the original Kindle Fire the past two years roughly, and this one is way above that version.  Is it better than the Kindle Fire HD version?  Depends, but probably not if price is your biggest factor.Pros:1) iPad Contender - Seriously.  The iPad in my opinion is way overpriced for what it does.  The Kindle Fire HDX is just as capable at handling most of the same work flow with a couple of differences.  Yes, this is tied to the Amazon App store.  If Google Play was standard, then Apple might be worried.  Right now though, Amazon is crippling their own success.2) Fluid Performance - Smooth as butter.  I have played around with everything available for the past two months and it handles it all with excellence.  Games, work, reading, etc run flawlessly (app issues not withstanding).3) Screen - Sharpest resolution I have ever seen on a screen this size.  Made the original Kindle Fire look like a 10 year old non-HD television.  I could stare at this thing for days (but won't).  Reading, movies, games, etc are shown in perfect HD resolution.NOTE - The blue pixel edge issue is there, but it is not distracting to me.  I actually kind of like it.  If you read a lot on white backgrounds, then it pops out more than normal.  The haze falls to the background after I begin reading the first page of something, and I never notice it much any more.4) Micro USB Connector - Bite it Apple!  :)  No cord carousal here.  If you have a cord sitting around, it most likely works for charging or connecting the Kindle Fire HDX.  For the first time ever - a plug adapter is included!  Amazon is including a plug adapter so you can actually charge the device through a regular electrical outlet.  What a concept Amazon!  That might catch on with other electronics (sarcasm).5) Bells and Whistles - This thing has it all (mostly).  Dual-band WiFi, HD screen, Amazon support (best in the world), light as a feather, etc, etc.Cons:1) Amazon App Store (sort of) - No Google Play?  I know Amazon wants everyone to use the device for their content, but not allowing one of the largest app stores on your Android device seems illogical.  I am able to use 3rd-party app stores to upload missing apps and outdated ones on the Amazon App Store, but still!2) USB Connection Port - The connection port on the device can be a bit of a nuisance.  You have to connect it at an angle on the device (around 30 degrees).  Just irritating to me for some reason as everything else has it straight, so your mileage may vary.3) Mayday Button Gimmick - I am a computer-savvy person.  I don't need help on where to press the power button or tweak the brightness.  If you are buying this for grandma or a person that never has used much technology in the past 10 years, then this is a life saver for you (no more annoying phone calls).4) Battery - I get a couple days of heavy usage (8 hours) out of it.  I just wish I could get the Kindle reader battery life of 4 to 8 weeks.  :)Overall:This is finally the Kindle to put Amazon in striking range of Apple on the tablet front.  If you crave everything Amazon like me, then it is a no brainer to purchase this.  If you are not, then buy it anyway as you will save at least $100 over the nearest priced iPad.  If Amazon would just switch to Google Play for the app store, then there is nothing that would stop them from ruling the world!  :)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: New owned a Kindle or a Tablet and got this for Christmas and I love it! It's like a mini laptop to go! I highly recommend this to everyone, it's very user friendly and stays charged for quite a while.  And the possibilities are endless!! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX7"
Reviews.Author: Sandra Lagerblade
Reviews.Content: Granddaughter is happy with the gift, so I am happy. The most amazing thing was I read a book on Kindle before it even reached the bookstores!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Janis Ruid
Reviews.Content: I love it.  It does everything I need it to do to my satisfaction.  I find it user friendly and the clarity is superb.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Patricia Smith
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use; light enough to hold for 30 minutes or more without causing pain or fatigue. images are very clear and most of all the battery life is excellent. I have used it everyday for last three weeks.

Reviews.Title: Present for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Lu A Britt
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter. She loved it! My only complaint was that she loved it so much, we couldn't get her to put it down long enough to watch everyone else open their presents!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Anne Guest
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's a real "learning adventure" for a 68 yr old "Grammy"! I'm really enjoying all the Apps and playing "Candycrush"!

Reviews.Title: fast and durable
Reviews.Author: frostwolf04
Reviews.Content: the quad core processing unit makes gaming easy and reading smooth. the kindle fire hdx is also extremely durable on its sides to protect from drops

Reviews.Title: Loved it for media. Not enough apps.
Reviews.Author: mary j master
Reviews.Content: This was for a friend.  She loved the size, setup, and, of course, viewing media was awesome.She returned it because the specific apps she wanted were not in the Amazon App Store. If you can't side load or extract .apk files, you may not find all the apps you want or need - at this time. I'm sure the Amazon will enlarge their offerings with time.

Reviews.Title: Amazing, Fast, Beautiful display
Reviews.Author: Arthur Atlas "atlasarch"
Reviews.Content: I am incredibly pleased.  The HDX has far surpassed my expectations and I couldn't be happier and more impressed.  A great product.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Shirley Sierak
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for our son.  The year before we had given a Kindle to our grandson (his 14 yr son) and the four of our children had gotten together and given me a Kindle for Christmas.  Which I enjoy very much.  This it appeared on our son's list.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Tristan
Reviews.Content: I received the HDX 7" with offers from a work Christmas party. So far I enjoy it and have since picked up Amazon Prime to go with it.I do also own HP Touchpad and the Google Nexus 7 (2013)Out of the 3 I use the HDX the most although I don't like the fact that my google account and app purchases don't transfer over. The screen quality is great and I am satisfied with the battery life. The ads don't ever seem to get in the way or bother me. I tend to take this thing everywhere with me.The only thing is I tend to prefer the straight android environment of the Nexus 7. Otherwise this is a great device.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted in a Tablet
Reviews.Author: SteveD "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Even though there are more flexible tablets available, the Kindle Fire HDX does everything that I want and does it well.

Reviews.Title: HDX
Reviews.Author: Paula Beaty "lilred"
Reviews.Content: I owned a Kindle Fire and really enjoyed it. I upgraded to the HDX. Am enjoying even more. The battery life is much longer. I can read a whole book without charging.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Paulette Freese
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet, and overall I like it.  I have Amazon Prime, and purchased the Kindle with the intent to down load movies.  So far, I haven't gotten around to doing that.  It came with instructions as to how to connect to WiFi, so I got that going the first night.  I like the cloud sharing of books and photos from my phone.  Setting it up was not intuitive and I had to use the help key.  The help was fantastic, and got me set up with my books from the Kindle on my phone right away.  I chose the 4GLTE option so I could use it in areas where there is no WiFi.  I have not been able to figure out how to access the 4GLTE option.  I've downloaded several sets of instructions, but so far, no luck.  I may need to break down and call the help line again.
